subSubSection.paragraph:
Paratypes :
1 lot, 5 specimens —NUP 3572, 5 (1 (m), 4 (f)), 48.0– 84.8 mm SL: Brazil , São Paulo , Ribeirão Grande , ribeirão das Batéias , upstream from the bridge at Ribeirão Grande to Intervales road, affluent of the
Rio Paranapanema , O.
T . Oyakawa & A. Akama ,
24 Aug 1997
.
